We are TrikeApps.

We create websites and applications that are great to use.

We custom design and build software to suit precise business needs, solve specific problems, and make you money.

There are 3 core elements you can expect from any of our apps:

intuitive

Applications will be both fast to learn & enjoyable to use

agile

Agile development reduces costs and improves freedom and flexibility

profitable

By understanding your business drivers, we'll deliver on your profits

what they said:

"Programmers that understand business... that's a powerful combination."

Gerard O'Donnell - Director SMT

So please have a look through some of our projects, discover more about our approach, or just give us a call on +61 3 9024 2760 and ask for Mike (our boss guy).
